title: why cant i log in?
body: my account was hacked into earlier today and i submitted riot an unathorized purchase request cause whoever was the little no life prick, spent $70 on rp. i cant seem to log into my account now and i dont know wht to do...i changed the password so many times.... i did forgot username and its still the same,, i just cant log in..help pls..

replies.body:
It sounds like your account is still compromised. If you haven't already submitted a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), I recommend doing so that our account specialists can assist you in recovering your account.

Let me know if you have any questions.
